criteria.name: Comprehensiveness
criteria.description: The budget accounts for all necessary costs and expenditures without significant omissions.

criteria.name: Accuracy
criteria.description: Cost estimates are realistic and based on current market rates and project requirements.

criteria.name: Transparency
criteria.description: The budget clearly breaks down costs with sufficient detail to understand allocation.

criteria.name: Alignment with Scope
criteria.description: The budget accurately reflects the scope and requirements of the project.

criteria.name: Cost Effectiveness
criteria.description: The budget demonstrates good value for money and efficient resource allocation.

criteria.name: Contingency Planning
criteria.description: The budget includes appropriate contingency funds for unforeseen circumstances.

criteria.name: Cost Justification
criteria.description: Major cost items are justified with clear rationales for their inclusion and amount.

criteria.name: Budget Phasing
criteria.description: The budget is appropriately phased or distributed across project timeline and milestones.

criteria.name: Flexibility
criteria.description: The budget includes provisions for adjustments based on changing requirements.

criteria.name: ROI Consideration
criteria.description: The budget demonstrates consideration of return on investment or value delivered.

evaluationInstructions: Evaluate the budget against each criterion. For each criterion, provide a score between 0.0 and 1.0, where 0.0 is completely failing to meet the criterion and 1.0 is perfectly meeting it. Provide specific feedback for scores below the pass threshold.
